name: Curse of the Doll
description:
In this game you need to stop demons from possessing a doll.  You have a hammer that you can use to fight off demon hands while also trying to destroy as many dolls as you can.  

After destroying a doll, demons get progressively angrier and become much faster.

Tips:

You cannot make another hit without moving the mouse, so SWING the hammer before attacking

If you want to get a higher score it is recommended to farm hands on easier levels, as the hands get too fast for you to react. On the other hand on first few levels the swing cooldown is too long so you might get overwhelmed by the number of hands. Its all about balance

GOOD LUCK!!!

This game was made during XAMK game jam 31.03.2023 - 02.04.2023. 

Made by XAMK university students of Game Design. 

Special thanks to XAMK game jam organizers.
